title: How to start blogging and what is required to do it - Quora

response.answer_text: I can take you through 5 easy steps to get your blog set up which should also answer the second part of your question about what is required to do it. However before you start these steps you need to decide on your topic. So grab a brew and get your notepad and pen out…. Make a list of 3 things you are good at3 things you are interested in or enjoy3 things you want to learn aboutHere’s mine…  So now you have a list of topics to choose from! Right now we can look at getting the blog set up. 1. First let’s choose the right blogging platform for your new blog. I recommend you use WordPress! Because…. It’s freeIt’s easy to useIt is simple to customiseIt is designed with bloggers in mind.2. Then you need to choose a domain name. Have a look at these tips for choosing your domain name...  Try and include the topic in the name where possible as this will help massively further down the line…… The form mentioned above you can find on my blog post 3. Setup your blog & web hosting. ​The only hosting company I recommend for beginners is ​iPage because- Free custom domain - They include a 100% free custom domain name.1 Click WordPress installation - Installing WordPress takes less than 30 seconds.24/7 support - No matter what happens, they are available to help.$200 free advertising - You also get $​200 worth of free ad coupons to kick start your blog.​Budget friendly- ​It costs just $1.99 per month!​4. Choose a theme. The theme is the body language that could massively contribute to your blogs success. So when selecting your theme look for something simple and clutter free, mobile responsive, optimized for speed and SEO ready. 5. Write your first blog post. You don’t need to be a Shakespeare to be able to write blog posts. But what you have to be able to do is communicate clearly, with correct spelling and good grammar and show a bit of personality and flare. I consider these points when writing Tell it like it is – straight & to the pointNo fake business etiquetteLike I’m talking to a friend in the pubNo more than 3 sentences in a paragraphShort & punchyKeep it simpleSo with those steps your blog is now set up, so I will leave you with a few tips…. 1. Post length. A good rule of thumb is to aim for a minimum 1,500 words and then adjust for your audience 2. What posts should you write to get traffic... Find where your audience spends their timeFind out the best way to connect with themCreate content that answers their questionsShare it with them3. In my opinion, the best free plugins for your blog- SumoMe - This plugin makes it easy to add email capture forms and social sharing buttons.Yoast SEO - This plugin will improve the SEO of your blog.WP Super Cache - This plugin will make your blog load quicker.WP Smush - Automatically compresses images so they load faster.Drip - Take advantage of the free account to add email marketing to your blog without spending a penny.4. BACK UP BACK UP BACK UP. Backing up your blog is easy and is something I highly recommend you do independently of your host. My 2 favorite free backup plugins BackWPUpUpDraftPlus5. Forget the money for now! I see it time and time again, people learn how to start a blog and make money and after a couple of months when there is no money – they quit. So whatever your reasons for starting your blog, forget about the money and focus on helping other people that share your passion. The rest will come later 6. Always have a thought out plan of attack and keep it simple. 7. Make friends! These friends will make your life a lot easier when you launch your post, as their shares and links will get you traffic. Don’t forget to do the same for them, it works both ways and when you write your content do it with these people in mind.

well! let’s devide your question into pieces because it has more than one piece within a single piece. How can I start a blog? this is a question you will find any forum or any goup dealing with making money online. there is no denying to the fact that blogging is a very wonderful place where one can have the total and absolute freedom to express h/herself. you are not obliged to say what you are complled to say but to say what your mind produces and your hearts feels happy with. coming back to your questio. I think that to set up a blog where to write and share thought with people about niche you love, you need to think about which platform fits your goals and purposes from blogging. there are many platforms on internet that can help you have your own blog or website. I will walk you through two main wonderful platforms i have experiences with. these platforms are: Blogger: blogger is a free platform for creating blogs to share contents. You will need to pay no cent if you are just looking for a free blog. all you will have to do is to check Blogger.com - Create a unique and beautiful blog. It’s easy and free. then click on ‘’create your blog’’ and start filling out your information. what you should know about blogger? you should know that using blogger, it can be a kind of risking of your contents. if you are aiming to set up a long life blog i advise you to not use it. WHY? Because blogger has the total power over your blog and it has the right to shut it down at any time without giving any reason. There are many peple who have lost their blogs for no reason. Wordpress: wordpress; my favorite platform, is one of the most fomus platforms on internet. A lot of people are using it from all over the world. it is very easy to handle. it has so many features to use. it is free for those who want free blogs. If you want to set up a business blog then you will have to pay for that. you can check WordPress.com: Create a website or blog and see the pricess. the best thing about wordpress is that you dont have to stress about your blog being shut down someday like in blogger. your blog is very safe and you have controle over you blog. What does it require to blog? honstly, i started blogging without having any professional skills. I believe that if you are engaged in blogging, you will learn how to do and handle things automatically. Here are some few things you need to keep in mind since blogging is concerned: Love: bear in mind that you will never do good in something you do not love. you will need to feel happy in doing something in order to do it well and succeed in it. So, you should choose a niche that you love a lot and in which you find your comfort when you are writing about. Love gives passion.Work: if you wanna get good fruits from blog, believe me, you will have to give it enought time and take anything you do in it very seriously. the more you give enough time to something, the more it takes you seriously and pay you back with satisfied results.Be Unique: ‘be unique even if you are alone’’. your success depends on your contents; on what you write. it is not always about quantity, but about quality. do not worry about how long your post should be or how short, but how heavy it is: how informative it is. short and informative is better than long and makes no sense.I guess these are the main things you need to know as a biginner. I hope this help and Best of Luck.

Blogging has become a career today in the digital world, on which people are attracting very much because this field is such that if you start it and work hard, you will get both name and money. If you want to make your career in Blogging, then you must know about blogging. First of all, you have to know what is a Blog and Blog writing? If you already have information about these things, you can start blogging without any problems. Blogging is very easy, anyone can start Blogging. The only required thing is that you have to knowledge about the topic on which you are going to write your blog. Sometimes people think that blogging needs knowledge of coding, I would like to say that in today's time there are many such blogging platforms are available which facilitates to create a blog without any kind of coding. like Blogger, Wordpress, Quora, Tumbler You just have to basic computer knowledge and the information about your Blog niche. Things required to start Blogging These are the basic knowledge that is required for blogging. But besides this, you will need some things without which you will not be able to start blogging while knowing about blogging. These are some of the things that are very important for blogging. Blogging PlatformYou can not start blogging without setting a blogging platform. It is the most important to start blogging. Today there are many free and paid blogging platforms available on the internet, which you can choose according to your convenience. Google Blogger, Wordpress, Tumbler, and Quora are some of the great blogging platform available right now. It depends on you which blogging platform you would prefer to work on. You can use the Google blogging platform Blogger to start a blogging career. It's totally free by Google, only you get Google domain blogspot.com by default with your domain name. Or you can use WordPress to start blogging. But the Word Press is a paid service, for which you have to pay. At the moment, WordPress is the best blogging platform, if you are going to start blogging and are able to pay. Domain NameAfter determining the blogging platform, you now have to take a domain name for your blog. Today you will find many domain service providers on the internet, from which you can buy a better domain name for your blog or website at a very low cost. Web HostingAfter that, you will have to buy a web hosting service for your blog or website. Hosting is very important to bring your blog or website online and upload to the internet online. There are many service providers on the internet that offer hosting services for your blog or website at a very cost-effective price. Or if you are going to start your blogging on Google Blogger, then you do not have to worry about things like Hosting because Google Blogger also offers free hosting services. So decide quickly and start Blogging.

starting a blog is one of the easiest thing to do on earth. But you will have to be prepared. You need a blog and you need a niche. a blog you can get free from blogger or wordpress and you can also use paid version too. but you niche is the area of interest you want to be writing about. So think about what you are good at that you can write about or what you are willing to learn more about and share with your blog readers. If you have not idea on what to do, take a blogging class on udemy or any other online learning course. or just outsource your blog design, articles and blog post etc

Aside from owning your domain and getting a reliable host, here are additional tips to help you start blogging: Keyword research: Search for related keywords every time you plan to publish a new post. Then, ask yourself: What keyword is this post even targeting?Is it optimized enough?Is the search volume high enough?Add call to actions: A CTA is anything you want for your customers to take action on. Example: Subscribe to a newsletter,Read next post,Make a purchase,Choose quality over quantity: Publishing daily or weekly posts is not necessary especially if it compromises quality. High quality articles can give you following: BacklinksHigh TrafficCollaborations/ Sponsorships
